name: Crescendo Lab
description: Developer of a marketing technology intended for artificially intelligent marketing. The company provides LINE official account marketing, one-on-one in-depth interaction, enhance brand favor, promote sales, expand member data management, connect with the customer relationship management system, helping organizations gradually realize marketing automation.
